articles.title: Singapore jails 77-year-old man for misappropriating S$4.7mil - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A certified public accountant with over 40 years' standing misappropriated funds from various sources, including a dead person's estate, to feed overseas investments which turned out to be scams.
